para: This is a simple human readable version of the data file, handy for listings of any type of waypoint files. Use the 'nosep' option to suppress the lines of dashes between entries. Use the 'encrypt' option to encrypt hints from Groundspeak GPX files. Use the 'logs' option to include Groundspeak cache logs.
The following command line reads a GPX file with Groundspeak extensions and writes a text file with encrypted hints:
